input: Hello, I'm a 45-year-old woman, and I've recently started experiencing sudden weight loss, night sweats, and fatigue. I've also noticed swollen lymph nodes in my neck. Should I be worried about these symptoms?
Hi there, my 10-year-old son has been coughing frequently, and it seems worse at night. He has asthma but hasn’t had an attack recently. Should I bring him in for an evaluation?
Good morning, I've been feeling really dizzy and lightheaded whenever I stand up. I'm a 60-year-old man with a history of high blood pressure. Could this be related to my medication?
Hi, I'm a 33-year-old pregnant woman in my second trimester. I've been having intense headaches and occasional blurry vision. Is this something I should talk to my doctor about?
Hello, I've been experiencing chest pain that radiates to my left arm for the past week. I’m 50 and I have a family history of heart disease. Should I be concerned and seek immediate attention?
Hey, I'm 23 and recently started a new workout routine, but I'm experiencing sharp knee pain after running. Is this normal, or should I see someone about it?
Hi, my mother is 78 and has been feeling very weak and confused over the last few days. She has diabetes. Could this be a sign of something serious?
Hello, I'm 29 years old and have been feeling anxious lately. I've also noticed some tightness in my chest that comes and goes. Is this something I should get checked out?
Hi, I’ve been suffering from severe allergies and a persistent itchy rash on my arms. I’m 40 years old. Could this be a food allergy or something else?
Hey, my husband has a history of migraines, but he’s also been having trouble sleeping and increased anxiety. Could these issues be related in some way?
